snippet: The Chaos Computer Club filed a criminal complaint accusing the government of helping U.S. and British intelligence agencies to spy on German citizens.
abstract: Chaos Computer Club, leading hacker organization based in Germany, files a criminal complaint against Chancellor Angela Merkel and members of her government; complaint accuses them of violating the law by helping intelligence agencies in the United States and Britain spy on German citizens.
lead_paragraph: The Chaos Computer Club filed a criminal complaint accusing the government of helping U.S. and British intelligence agencies to spy on German citizens.

headline.main: Hacker Group Accuses Merkel Government of Helping to Spy
headline.print_headline: Germany: Hacker Group Says Officials Aided Allies’ Spying
